name: Water Colour Puzzle
description:
Water Colour Puzzle is a fun and addictive color sorting puzzle game! A challenging yet relaxing game to exercise your brain!

HOW TO PLAY:

• Tap any glass to pour water to another glass.

• The rule is that you can only pour the water if it is linked to the same color and there’re enough space on the glass.

• Try not to get stuck!

FEATURES:

• One finger control.

• Multiple unique level

• FREE & EASY TO PLAY.

• Different Difficulty Modes.
